short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removed backdrop layer from various news sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove html elements that hides the content of the news, acting as a revealer of content.
Currently supports "Il Corriere", "Il Messaggero" and "Il Corriere dello Sport".
Also removes invasive cookie popup from "Il Fatto Quotidiano", "Il Sole 24 Ore", "Repubblica" and "Ansa.it".
